item.title: T2 error help
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

Could someone help me out? Every now and then, I get this error:

If I’m right, this is the packetsize being wrong, but now I’m wondering if what I want to do is right

According to what I see, it tells me that packet 81 should have size 0, while in the packetsizes it’s set to -2. (am I right?)
